pages.text: Souls are complex entities and therefore containing them is certainly no easy task. The tool used to fulfill it has been dubbed the $(item)Conjuring Focus$(). A simple lens made of $(l:conjuring:basics/soul_composite_materials#soul_alloy)Soul Alloy$() and reinforced with some $(item)Gold$(), it employs their synergistic attributes to safely contain the inner construct of a certain soul type.

When inserted into a $(l:conjuring:basics/conjurer)Conjurer$() it's true power will start to unfold, and mobs of the stored soul's type will be conjured.$(p)To trap a soul inside a focus, one shall seek to perform a $(l:conjuring:rituals/ritual_of_extraction)Ritual of Extraction$().
